document.full_text: thousands took to the streets in cities across morocco on sunday demanding better civil rights and an end to corruption in the moderate north african country where the king this month promised constitutional reform.
document.title: thousands in morocco march for rights, end to graft
lines_and_colors: thousands took to the streets in cities across morocco on sunday demanding better civil rights and an end to corruption in the moderate north african country where the king this month promised constitutional reform.
